title: Looking for a rank team for some season rewards.
body:
Will play any lane that is needed. 
My best champ is probably zac jungle. 
Will play/learn any champ that is needed for a team comp.
Will use voice chat if needed 
Have a gold and silver account if that matters.

add Dangerous K

replies.body: add me i might be ya boi
Do you have a main role if so what is it?
